aima.core.search.adversarial

Interface AdversarialSearch<STATE,ACTION>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlphaBetaSearch, ConnectFourAIPlayer, IterativeDeepeningAlphaBetaSearch, MinimaxSearch

    public interface AdversarialSearch<STATE,ACTION>
    Variant of the search interface. Since players can only control the next move, method makeDecision returns only one action, not a sequence of actions.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metrics getMetrics()
      Returns all the metrics of the search.
      ACTION makeDecision(STATE state)
      Returns the action which appears to be the best at the given state.
